data.text: @sheetal11218011 @AAPDelhi @satyenderjain @msisodia @ipathak25 Aapko aapke job n rights mile .aapne logo ki jindagi bachai ab desh ki baari hai ki wo aap ki help kare aapko wapis hospital mein pehle Jesse respect mile Jesse us time log dete the
@sheetal11218011 @AAPDelhi @satyenderjain @msisodia @ipathak25 Justice for nursing officers.. save corona warriors..
@sheetal11218011 @AAPDelhi @satyenderjain @msisodia @ipathak25 We want justice for our pride, for our job. We need everyone's support. https://t.co/ZhmuKXfYrk
@sheetal11218011 @AAPDelhi @satyenderjain @msisodia @ipathak25 We nurses (heart of hospitals) should not be treated like this.

@sheetal11218011 @AAPDelhi @satyenderjain @msisodia @ipathak25 Delhi government has decided to close all the corona center's suddenly What about the corona warriors (nursing officers) ?We hope that you will surely do something to save our job @SatyendarJain@nursestandard  #savethesaviors #savenurses
#LNJPRamleelaGroundNursingOfficers
